title: Chandbali Jhumka: Regal Emerald and Ruby Embrace
features: Classic Chandbali crescent moon design intricately embellished with CZ stones. Floral top motif featuring a central Emerald cabochon surrounded by Ruby and CZ accents. Delicately crafted gold beads dangling from the bottom for a gentle sway. Traditional South Indian design with a contemporary flair.
occasions: and special occasions. Equally stunning with traditional sarees or contemporary evening wear.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship reflects Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage. The classic Chandbali design is a timeless symbol of elegance and prosperity. The combination of Emerald, Ruby, and Gold is considered auspicious in South Indian traditions. Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear. A statement piece that will be treasured for generations.
